alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 5:18PM PST until December 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches valleys with 6 to 12 inches at Loup Loup and Blewett Passes. * WHERE...Winthrop, Plain, Leavenworth, Methow, Twisp, Loup Loup Pass, Conconully, and Mazama. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected Saturday into Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
